name: Dilli Kaand
description: ‘Dilli Kaand’ is a lazy film that seems to have been made purely to capitalise on the Delhi crime than give you any meaningful insight.

name: Nirmal Anand Ki Puppy
description: The story revolves around the lives of Nirmal Anand (Karanveer Khullar), an anti-diabetic drug salesman, and his Christian wife Sarah (Gillian Pinto).

name: Faactory
description: Faactory narrates the same old story of a young man's obsession with a girl he wants by hook or by crook.
